casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Clyburn, Appellant.
Submitted. January 5, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and BarBIERI, JJ.
Henry j. Lotto, for appellant.
Richard Max Bochol and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
April 22, 1971:
